title: Is there some law or Star News ploicy that prevents you from answering the question I sent about who is ahead in the race for the 7th District Congressional seat?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Jim, I thought you'd be interested in this latest poll story link: http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100929/ARTICLES/100929586/1155?Title=Poll-McIntyre-Pantano-in-dead-heat
